Name: Popeye Sour
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
7.5 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
MUDDLE spinach in base of shaker.
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker.
Garnish with spinach leaf pegged to rim.
Review: Spinach gives this cachaça-based cocktail a vibrant green colour while its flavour is influenced by lime, ginger and rich almond.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Juanillo Falcon at Creps al Born in Barcelona, Spain.
